## aads negatives adgroup-find

Find ad group-level negative keywords

```
aads negatives adgroup-find [flags]
```

```
      --all                    Fetch all pages
      --campaign-id int        Campaign ID

      --offset int             Start offset
      --selector-json string   Selector JSON
```
